description: CENSUS YEAR is the census year that the data is collected. e.g., 2006, 2011.
CENSUS_SUBDIVISION_ID: Foreign Key, linking to CENSUS_SUBDIVISION_ID in CEN_CENSUS_SUBDIVISIONS, e.g., 5901022
DATA_PUBLICATION_YEAR: The year in which the source of the information in this table was published, e.g., 2014
